biotools.summary: Automated pipeline that uses state-of-the-art machine learning algorithms to create a disease risk model based on a given GWAS SNP dataset and assesses its predictive performance for unseen datasets. The pipeline can either use a first dataset for training the model and a second for validation, or perform a nested k-fold cross-validation on a single dataset.

bioschemas.name: MACLEAPS
bioschemas.summary: Automated pipeline that uses state-of-the-art machine learning algorithms to create a disease risk model based on a given GWAS SNP dataset and assesses its predictive performance for unseen datasets. The pipeline can either use a first dataset for training the model and a second for validation, or perform a nested k-fold cross-validation on a single dataset.
